title: Can i run LoL? And how much FPS could i get?
body:
Operating System
	Windows 10 Pro 64-bit
CPU
	Intel Celeron @ 1.60GHz	49 째C
	Braswell 14nm Technology
RAM
	4,00GB DDR3 @ 1599MHz (11-11-11-28)
Motherboard
	LENOVO Lenovo B51-30 (CHV)	50 째C
Graphics
	Generic PnP Monitor (1366x768@60Hz)
	Intel HD Graphics (Lenovo)
	2047MB NVIDIA GeForce 920M (Lenovo)	43 째C
	ForceWare version: 382.64
	SLI Disabled
Storage
	931GB Western Digital WDC WD10JPCX-24UE4T0 (SATA)	37 째C
Optical Drives
	PLDS DVD-RW DA8AESH
Audio
	Realtek High Definition Audio

replies.body: I couldn't suggest any specifics or make guarantees, but our[ minimum specs ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements)guide should help.  This will offer recommended settings as well to help find an option best fit for you.
